chefStats

A library of statistical methods for chef-style AMNOG analyses

Aim

The {chefStats} package aims to provide a library of fast, validated methods for use in AMNOG analysis created by the chef package.

As the functions found in chefStats are designed to be used with chef in the context of the ramnog framework, it may be unwieldy to use these functions independently.

Installation

The package is available to install from GitHub:

remotes::install_github("hta-pharma/chefStats")

How to contribute

For information on how to contribute, please refer to ramnog contributing documentation.

More information

These site focuses on the functions of chefStats. For more context on how these functions should be utilized to produce an AMNOG-like analysis, please see the ramnog documentation.
